---
title: GHQ 12 vs RAPI
url: "/compare-harmonise-instruments/ghq-12-vs-rapi/"
date: 2025-01-19
---

## GHQ 12 vs RAPI

Harmony can help comparative studies in psychology research like GHQ 12 vs RAPI. GHQ 12, a widely accepted measure for detecting psychological distress and RAPI, an instrument for scrutinizing alcohol related problems, often require a painstaking and time-intensive matching of items manually.

Harmony simplifies this process by using natural language processing and generative AI models, offering a much more efficient approach to harmonising questionnaire items. Harmony empowers researchers to extract valuable insights, test consistency across studies, and track social conditions' impact. 

## Compare the items in GHQ 12 English and RAPI

Specifically, in the case of GHQ 12 vs RAPI, Harmony can provide a percentage match between each item in both questionnaires. This capability not only streamlines the harmonisation process but also boosts accuracy. Moreover, Harmony also allows you to drag and drop your instruments into its web interface, enhancing its practicality. In summary, Harmony presents a powerful solution for psychologists and researchers working on comparative studies like GHQ 12 vs RAPI.
